Others: The Memphis Grizzlies won their home opener against the Orlando Magic with a score of 124-111.
Ja Morant, Marcus Smart, and Jaren Jackson Jr. were highlighted as key players in the game.
The Grizzlies finished with 38 assists, their most since April 2023.
Jay Huff and Santi Aldama had strong performances off the bench.
Scotty Pippen Jr. finished with 11 points and 12 assists.
The article mentions that the Grizzlies are missing key players such as Luke Kennard, GG Jackson, and Vince Williams Jr.
